12.content: what kind of size story
12.title: Size Story

info.brief_description: Adventures in the anthro world of Xetrem  (Fetishes are alowed)
info.description:
<H1> <B> <U> Characters</U> </B> </H1>

Name: Prince Kozan Fenrir Shoku

Age: 17

Species: Wolfboy halfling

Birth date: July 29th

Astrological Sign: Leo

Hair color: Black

Eye color: Green

Fur color: Brown

Weapons: Black Katana (GetsuKage)

Powers: Regeneration elemental magic complete control over the element of darkness

Personality: Strong Willed, Brave, Calm, Serious, Funny. Kozan will always fight for what's right and justly punish anyone who commits crimes.

Name: Princess Mira Regulus Shoku

Age: 16

Species: Neko

Birth date: Febuary 13th

Astrological Sign: Aquarius

Hair color: Blond

Eye color: Blue

Fur color: Yellow

Weapons: A Cutlass with a gold blade and silver handle (Shinigu Taihou)

Powers: Micro claw (hand glows yellow and is able to shrink people by touch) (can also shot it like a gun), Macro claw (Same as Micro claw only the glow is red and it makes people grow), Control over Light Magic, Can make her stomach acid strong enough
to digest metal or weak enough so it can't digest people, truth eyes (the ability to force people to tell the truth by looking at them)

Personality: Playful, Kind, Energetic. Mira is extremely playful and doesn't always get the tiny peoples consent before playing with them. She it a bit rough but would never dream of seriously harming her "Toys".


Name: Ally (Alison) Terra Shoku

Age: 14

Species: Neko halfling

Birthdate: August 8th

Astrological sign: Leo

Hair Color: Pink

Eye color: blue

Fur color: pink

Weapon: a diamond sword (FunsaiRiku)

powers: control over earth and slight size powers (very bad at it)

Personaliy: gentle, sweet, skidish, Ally is very shy and as scared of strangers and Mira

Name: Charlie Haru Gailstrom

Age: 18

Species: Dogboy

Birthdate: March 12th

Astrological Sign: Pisces

Hair color: Brown

Eye color: Brown

Fur color: Yellow

Weapons: A Snake Staff/Sword (OrochiKaze)

Powers: Control over Wind magic and a very good mechanic that can build awesome things

Personality: Charlie is a Dogboy who was sold by his parents to a govt facility for a half eaten taco that was a worse the taco bell quality (I know it is hard to believe that quality exists)he was taught incorrectly how the world works as an experiment to see how he would react to the real world when they kicked him out at 18. He is Smart but uneducated he is also brave (when he needs to be) He is Arrogant and often says things that get his ass kicked.

Name: David Blaze

Hair color: Brown

Eye color: Blue

Age: 17

Species: Human (Can turn into an emerald feathered Phoenix)

Birth date: January 10th

Astrological Sign: Aquarius

Weapons: Fire Sword (HoTori)

Powers: Is the worlds greatest machinist and weapon makers can build anything he sets his mind to.

Personality: Calm and hard working he won't give up on any job

Name: Ragno(rok) Altem

Age: 24

Species: Wolfboy-Neko-Human Hybrid (contains the DNA of all three species)

Birth date: October 31th

Astrological Sign: Scorpio

Hair color: White

Eye color: Red

Fur color: Brown

Weapons: a blood red cleaver with a green square guard that can suck out an enemy's blood (Blood Fang)

Powers: Can create Skeloton minions to to his bidding and brain wash people into his slaves (by putting a mark on their foreheads)

Personality: A Cold Heartless monster that hates all cratures he belives that wolves should rule over all other people. He even thinks his own sister is inferior (but he cannot bring himself to kill her or Kozan)


<h4> <b> You are free to add in your own characters </b> </h4>

<H3> Story type <H3>

I will allow Size fetish, adventure, and erotic stories , almost any fetish is alowed (i will not allow Fat fetish)

Gay and Lesbian is a okay same with toilet suff (if dealing with size fetish)
